did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Friends of the Temple of Music and Art records 1976-1981

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Friends of the Temple of Music and Art.

did.abstract: Friends of the Temple of Music and Art Records was a civic organization formed in 1976 in Tucson, Arizona, to restore and preserve the Temple of Music and Art, home of the Saturday Morning Musical Club, and to encourage the development of the performing and visual arts. The group disbanded in 1981. Includes correspondence, reports, minutes of meetings, financial records, clippings, publications, and programs of performances sponsored by the group.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Friends of the Temple of Music and Art records (AZ 444). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: A civic organization formed in 1976 in Tucson, Arizona, to restore and preserve the Temple of Music and Art, home of the Saturday Morning Musical Club, and to encourage the development of the performing and visual arts. The group disbanded in 1981.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized chronologically by record type.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, reports, minutes of meetings, financial records, clippings, publications, and programs of performances sponsored by the group.
